name: Warptorio2_Language_Pack
title: Mining Space Industries II / Warptorio2 Language Pack
description:
Localizations for Mining Space Industries II, Warptorio2 and relative mods (Rocket Silo Construction, Warptorio2 Expansion, Cold Biters, Explosive Biters, Armoured Biters etc...)

Locales included: Czech, Japanese (partial), Russian, Ukrainian.
author: Shadow_Man, Factorio community
